review: I can't say enough about how much we love our Fire TV! It's our main source of entertainment. The voice recognition is great, the interface is easy to use. the remote is simple and clean, and the best part is we can hide the box behind the tv and the remote still works seamlessly. We can even go around the corner with no visibility to the box and it still works. We also have a Roku HD, and the Fire TV blows it out of the water!!! Thanks Amazon!
author: Ashley Dirks

review: I had a WD TV Live prior to this, and loved it for several years.  In comparison, the video quality on the firetv is better, and it's much, much faster.  The only downside for me is the lack of native local media support.  This can be rectified by adding third party programs like XMBC, if you're up for a bit of hacking.
